summary:
"Agatha All Along" is a catchy song from the TV show *WandaVision*. It was written by Kristen Anderson-Lopez and Robert Lopez, who also wrote the show's theme song. The song is sung by Kathryn Hahn and features a fun, retro sound inspired by old TV shows like *The Munsters* and *The Addams Family*. 

It became very popular after it was shown on TV and was released as part of the show's soundtrack. The song even won an Emmy Award for its awesome music and lyrics!
title: Agatha All Along (song)
